description: Detects a suspicious command line execution that invokes PowerShell with reference to an AppData folder
name: PowerShell Script Run in AppData
query: (process.command_line:(*powershell.exe* OR *\\powershell* OR *\\pwsh* OR *pwsh.exe*) AND process.command_line:*\/c\ * AND process.command_line:*\\AppData\\* AND process.command_line:(*Local\\* OR *Roaming\\*))
author: Florian Roth
Jonhnathan Ribeiro
oscd.community
